name: pmg-gestion-image
description: Application qui g√®re les image des article de PMG

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r dotenv/config app.js dotenv_config_path=./config.env
scripts.docker: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r dotenv/config app.js dotenv_config_path=./config.docker.env
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true nodemon -r dotenv/config app.js dotenv_config_path=./config.env
